channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-3987] AbstractMethodError with secure CXF invocation
item.description:
/Users/tdiesler/git/fuse-eap/itests/standalone
 
[tdiesler@macbook standalone]$ mvn clean install -Dtest=SecureWebServiceProducerIntegrationTest

leads to 

10:49:49,078 INFO  [org.jboss.web] (ServerService Thread Pool -- 26) JBAS018210: Register web context: /simple
 
10:49:49,091 INFO  [org.jboss.as.server] (management-handler-thread - 1) JBAS015859: Deployed "simple.war" (runtime-name : "simple.war")

Exhausted after delivery attempt: 1 caught: org.apache.camel.CamelExecutionException: Exception occurred during execution on the exchange: Exchange[Message: Kermit]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This is likely going to get fixed by https://github.com/jboss-fuse/fuse-eap/pull/47
